Group saya sangat senang sekali karena KASUR DAN BANTALNYA PALING THEEEE BESSSTTT!!!! saya pernah nginep di hotel bintang 5 tapi bantalnya gak ada yg seenak Grand Ambarukkmoo..seharusnya Hotel Grand Ambarukkmo udah layak mendapatkan bintang 5!!!! Oh my God, group saya sangat nyenyak tidur disini.. Dan ibu Ida sangat helpfull sekali jika saya ada request ini itu.. Jam 3 pagi beliau masih saja menanyakan kondisi rombongan saya.. Saya sebagai klien merasa sangat PUAS di treat seperti itu oleh Ibu Ida yang humble sekali... Untuk next trip ke Jogja saya akan tetap pakai hotel Grand Ambarukkmo karena harga gak bisa bohong.. Kepuasan yang utama buat rombongan saya.. Jadi buat kalian yang masih ragu, saya sarankan Anda membaca ulang ulasan saya sampai Anda memastikan telah memesan kamar di Hotel Grand Ambarukkmo..Pesan yang lain pasti Anda menyesal.. Salam dari Seindo Travel & Event - Hana 081269008583..

text:
Saya telah menginap di hotel bintang ini dan saya sangat terkesan dengan fasilitas dan layanannya. Hotel ini memiliki lokasi yang sangat strategis, terletak di pusat kota dan mudah diakses dari berbagai tempat.

Saat saya tiba di hotel, saya disambut dengan hangat oleh staf yang ramah dan profesional. Check-in prosesnya sangat cepat dan mudah. Setelah itu, saya diantar ke kamar saya oleh seorang staf hotel yang sangat membantu dan menjelaskan semua fasilitas yang tersedia.

Kamar yang saya dapatkan sangat luas dan nyaman, dengan pemandangan yang indah dari jendela. Tempat tidurnya sangat nyaman dan saya tidur dengan sangat nyenyak. Kamar mandinya juga sangat bersih dan lengkap dengan semua perlengkapan mandi yang dibutuhkan.

Saya sangat menikmati fasilitas yang tersedia di hotel ini, terutama kolam renang yang sangat indah dan bersih. Selain itu, gym dan spa juga sangat baik dan dilengkapi dengan semua peralatan yang dibutuhkan.

Sarapan yang disajikan di restoran hotel juga sangat lezat dan beragam. Staf hotel sangat ramah dan membantu selama sarapan, dan selalu siap membantu jika dibutuhkan.

Secara keseluruhan, saya sangat merekomendasikan hotel bintang ini kepada siapa saja yang ingin merasakan pengalaman menginap yang luar biasa. Semua stafnya sangat ramah dan profesional, fasilitasnya sangat baik, dan lokasinya sangat strategis. Saya pasti akan kembali menginap di hotel ini di masa mendatang.

text:
Terima kasih Ibu Eny yang koordinasi by wa dan semua staf terkait sudah membantu mempersiapkan momen honeymoon staycation yang spesial buat kami. Makanannya enak terutama grilled tenderloinnya, salut buat chef nya dagingnya saya minta welldone tapi tetap juicy. Amenities lengkap, bahkan pasta giginya bermerk peps*dent, air panasnya juga kenceng ga perlu nunggu sama sekali. 
Saran untuk perbaikannya:
Untuk buffet mungkin bisa disediakan sarung tangan plastik atau diambilkan dari pihak hotel yang bagian prasmanan (selain bagian yang pondokan): salad, buah, puding, dan makanan berat. 
Untuk kebersihan sprei bisa dicek lagi, masih ada rambut dan debu" hitam di bawah duvetnya dan ada rambut di dalam buku menu makanan yg di meja, telp yang di kamar mandi juga sepertinya lupa dilap. 
Untuk parkiran kalau bisa dikasih tanda di mana lift menuju ke lobby nya. Soalnya akhirnya kami bingung, tanpa arah, n jadi angkat koper yg berat itu lewat tangga.
Tapi after all good hotelnya, terutama staf hotelnya ramah, terutama yang sambut saya waktu check in, terima kasih, kami jadi nyaman selama stay di sini.

text:
Hotel yang recomended+ worth di Jogja. Ada jembatan penyebrangan dengan akses langsung ke mall, protokol kesehatan cukup dijalankan, sehingga kamar dan fasilitas hotel terjamin bersih. Kualitas kamar nya cukup premium, luas kamar dan fasilitas persis seperti Royal Ambarrukmo, hanya saja tidak ada bath tub (kamar deluxe). Untuk breakfast menu nya cukup enak, hanya saja tidak begitu variatif dibandingkan dengan hotel sekelas. Untuk lobby pun juga tidak terlalu mewah, tetapi nyaman. Yang terakhir, saya mengapresiasi staff Hotel yang cukup jujur, saya sering meninggalkan dompet saat makan pagi (kamar dibersihkan saat kita sarapan). juga tanggap, terutama saat saya ketinggalan barang di hotel, langsung dikoordinasikan untuk diantar via expedisi. Untuk luas parkir cukup memadai. 

Overall, We will come back again for sure!

text:
Sekitar bulan April, tepatnya tgl. 19-21 April 2019 kami sekeluarga menginap di Grand Ambarrukmo hotel Jogja yg berlokasi tepat diseberang Ambarrukmo Plaza & disebelah Mall nya ada Royal Ambarrukmo Hotel yg barusan tgl. 16-17 Agustus 2019 kmrn kami inap. 
Setelah bertanya kepada pihak hotel ternyata Grand Ambarrukmo hotel ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ ini satu management dgn Royal Ambarrukmo hotel ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️.
Tapi secara bangunan, jelas Grand Ambarrukmo lah yg lebih baru & designnya pun lebih modern 👍👍
Sewaktu kami menginap bulan April mereka masih tahap awal membangun jembatan penyeberangan penghubung dengan Ambarrukmo Plaza tetapi per Agustus ini jembatannya sudah hampir rampung 👍👍👍
Bila anda ingin main ke Ambarrukmo Plaza untuk sementara kita akan dibantu diseberangkan oleh Security yg khusus berjaga di area penyeberangan yg telah ditentukan. 
Mau cari makan sangat gampang bila menginap di kedua hotel ini, banyak penjual makanan mulai kaki lima sampai food court didalam Plaza, ada laundry kiloan juga didekat hotel.

Kedatangan kami ke Grand Ambarrukmo disambut dengan ramah, senyum & sapa oleh para staff hotel 🤗🤗
Mobil’2 diarahkan menuju area parkir yg bertingkat dibelakang hotel. 
Proses check in lumayan cepat & efisien, tidak ada deposit yg diminta. 
Lobby nya tidak sebesar & seluas Royal Ambarrukmo tetapi kesan modern sudah tampak disini. 
Ada sofa nyaman & mini cafe yg menjual aneka Slices Cake yg sama enaknya dgn Punika Deli Cafe di Royal Ambarrukmo, tetapi dari segi harga lebih murah di mini cafe nya Grand Ambarrukmo (range harga 30-35rb per slice).
Dibelakang Cafe ada Restoran tempat breakfast. 

Kami segera menuju kamar type Deluxe Twin Room, request lantai atas dipenuhi oleh pihak hotel 👍👍
Lorong menuju kamar lumayan cantik & ada hiasan lampu bulat didinding yg menarik 😍😍
Twin Bed yg kami pesan berukuran 140cm masih cukup utk ditempati 2 orang per bed nya, tetapi jika sedang hamil seperti saya lebih baik pesan extra bed biar lebih legaaa 😁😁😁
Design & furniture kamar terlihat modern, minimalist tetapi bersih, rapi & nyaman. 
Ada Alkitab & Alquran diletakkan berdampingan di laci meja 😇😇
Didekat tempat tidur ada bbrp tombol pengaturan lampu’2 kamar. 
Sangat memudahkan tanpa kita harus bangun matiin lampu yaa 😎😎
Area kamar mandi nya ternyata lebih lebar dari area kamar mandi nya Royal Ambarrukmo.
Ammenities nya standar saja yaa, air panas berfungsi baik nyala terus. 
View dari jendela terlihat Ambarrukmo Plaza, Royal Ambarrukmo & rumah’2 sekitar hotel. 

Swimming Pool area ada di lantai atas, bukan rooftop tetapi ukuran kolamnya tidak seberapa besar. 
Disebelah kolam ada ruang meeting & gym.
Kolam dibuka sampai jam 7 malam. 

Waktunya breakfast, restoran memang tidak selebar restoran nya Royal Ambarrukmo tetapi service nya sama’2 juara bahkan kami yg sedang antri meja kosong dipersilahkan mengambil cheese cake & minuman kopi / teh yg disediakan di Mini Cafe depan Resto 😍😍😍
Untuk extra breakfast buat anak dikenai charge 80-85rb per anak, utk dewasa 2x lipatnya klo tidak salah. 
Tapi worthed kok bayar harga segitu karena menu makanan yg disediakan variasinya banyak, rasanya enak & menyenangkan utk disantap 👍👍👍
Jujur buat saya pribadi yg tidak cocok dgn taste makanan Jogja & sedang hamil pulaaa, taste menu breakfast dihotel sungguh jadi penyelamat buat saya, bisa makan dgn lahap & kenyang tanpa ada rasa mual maupun muntah 😍😍😍
Karena kami menginap saat Paskah maka pihak hotel memberi hiburan berupa Easter Bunny yg membagikan permen & jajanan kecil buat anak’2 🤩🤩

Tak terasa waktu inap 2 hari sudah berakhir & proses check out berlangsung cepat tidak ribet 👍👍
Staff yg bertugas dengan ramah bertanya kemana tujuan kita selanjutnya & tidak sungkan untuk memberi saran yg baik untuk kami yg awam dengan keadaan Jogja 🤗🤗🤗
Owya untuk tamu yg ingin memesan GoFood & GrabFood, baik di Grand Ambarrukmo maupun Royal Ambarrukmo tetap diperbolehkan yaa tetapi pihak Ojek Online hanya diijinkan untuk masuk sampai depan Lobby saja, tamu lah yg harus turun ambil pesanannya 😊😊

Demikian review jujur saya tentang Grand Ambarrukmo hotel Jogja, semoga membantu teman’2 semua 🤗🤗

text:
We spent two nights in two rooms that connected. The room is pretty comfy. This hotel uses many touch screen services (for lifts, and the lamp controller at the side of the bed). It is good. The services are good but not that super friendly. And there's a time when I returned to the hotel and want to take a bath, the towels weren't there. Also in my parents room (we have connecting rooms) there were no towels. So I call the room service and fortunately the towels came so fast. He said that the towels were still in laundry process at that time. But it was okay because the towels came so fast, not a big deal. 
And about the breakfast, the place is not that big but it is fine. And it has salad bar, yoghurt, cereal, fruits, dessert. The hotel also provide egg and bacon, sausages, Indonesian food and its traditional specials, also sushi. It is not that complete but I think it is okay. 
Overall it is good to staying here.

Kami menginap dua malam di sini dengan dua ruangan yang bersambungan. Hotel ini menggunakan banyak layar sentuh (untuk di lift dan pengontrol lampu di sebelah tempat tidur). Dan itu merupakan hal yang baik. Layanan yang diberikan sudah cukup baik, tapi tidak sebegitu sangat amat ramah. Dan waktu itu ada di saat saya kembali ke hotel dan mau mandi, namun tidak ada handuk sama sekali, bahkan di kamar orang tua saya juga tidak ada. Akhirnya saya telepon ke layanan kamar dan untungnya handuknya langsung datang sangat cepat. Yang mengantar bilang bahwa tadi handuknya masih dalam proses pencucian. Yah, untungnya datang dengan cepat jadi tidak membuat repot. Dan ini bukanlah masalah besar.  
Tentang sarapan pagi, tempatnya tidak terlalu besar tapi itu baik-baik saja. Hotel ini menyediakan salad, yoghurt, sereal, buah-buahan, dan makanan penutup. Lalu juga menyediakan telur, daging asap, dan sosis (seperti hotel pada umumnya), makanan Indonesia dan makanan tradisionalnya seperti bubur ketan dan bubur kacang hijau, dan juga ada sushi. Tidak terlalu lengkap tapi sudah cukup baik.

Secara keseluruhan menginap disini adalah pilihan yang baik.
title: Comfy rooms

- Front Office: Efficient. Check in/out mulus. Staff memberi impresi awal yang hangat dan menyenangkan, khas Yogya yang ngangenin
- Guest Room: Ruangan termasuk standard untuk ukuran hotel Yogya. Amenities lengkap termasuk slipper & bathrobe. Smoking room tersedia di lantai rendah. Jendela bersih dan lapang untuk planespotting. Housekeeping efisien
- Fasilitas: Pool tidak terlalu besar, ada di lantai 5. Dapat diakses dengan lift tersendiri
- Breakfast: Komplit untuk pilihan Indonesia/Western. Catatan khusus untuk coffee machine nya, Long Black nya wueenakk :) selalu nyempetin untuk nikmatin 2 gelas sambil breakfast
- Staff: Tak pernah lepas dari gesture, salam dan senyum yang memberi rasa nyaman. Good job team..

Minus Point:
- Kolam renang seharus nya bisa lebih besar dan mencerminkan standard *4. Rooftop tidak digunakan padahal secara lokasi sangat bagus untuk planespotting
- Berada di akses utama jalur utara kota membuat kemacetan sering terjadi di jalan raya depan hotel

Kesimpulan: Recommended. #Planespotting hotel, kamar tepat menghadap final approach bandara di kedua sisi. Customer Experience pribadi: 9 out of 10
title: ..berhasil menjaga standard nama Ambarrukmo..

owner_response.text:
Dear Rahmatpurwono,

Terima kasih sudah meluangkan waktu memberikan ulasan di Tripadvisor setelah mengikuti acara di Grand Ambarrukmo
 
Grand Ambarrukmo secara resmi beroperasi sejak Juli 2017 dan merupakan 'sister hotel' dari Royal Ambarrukmo. Hotel 
kami menyediakan ruang parkir sebanyak 5 lantai yang cukup luas dan nyaman terlindung dari hujan dan panas dibelakang hotel,  dengan kapasitas 130 mobil dan 95 sepeda motor yang mana akses untuk sepeda motor disediakan dibagian belakang hotel. 

Kami memiliki 3 meeting rooms di lantai dua dengan business center dan mushola dilantai yang sama untuk kenyamanan tamu. Sedangkan ballroom ada dilantai 5 dimana di lantai yang sama terdapat kolam renang, fitness center and Arcadaz lounge. 

Untuk set-up dan penyajian makanan dan minuman kami sajikan berdasarkan permintaan pelaksana atau panitia acara yang bersangkutan Terima kasih atas ulasan Bapak tentang meeting room dan peralatan meeting, dan juga rasa makanan dan makanan ringan (snack). 

Kami berharap Bapak bisa berkunjung kembali ke Grand Ambarrukmo Yogyakarta

Salam 
Diaz Yonadie 
General Manager

I stayed here for 2 nights and it was a right decission i made.
The hotel is considered new, the lobby, restaurant and public area were just meeting the expectation.

The room was beyond my expectation. It was spacious, clean, with comfy bed, and just enough to cater traveler’s need of a good rest.

Service delivered was average but meeting our expectation..

With it’s location that is near to airport and city center.. i would definately come back and recommend this hotel to others. Well, i did..

text:
Upon my arrival in this fresh and newly open hotel I greeted by their very attentive staffs. 
The design looks really nice and modern. What I love the most is the way they orchestrated the modern design without forgetting the Javanese culture. I had jamu as my welcome drink and it couldn’t be any better than that! Refreshing and spicy! 
My room is giant, beautiful and neat! This might sounds weird but Thank you Grand Ambarukmo Hotel for choosing a nice and comfortable toothbrush as a complimentary for your guest, this is what really makes me amazed compare to another hotel. What an intention to detail!
You’ll love the breakfast selection, traditional and modern... they have jamu for breakfast and that’s just perfect to me. 
The problem is only one, it took some time or approximately 45-50 minutes to get your food/drink when you order á la carte outside the buffet hours. 
But honestly, it is worth the wait! Try their Burger!!!!!!!

Thanks for making my stay so comfortable and happy!
title: Second home for our big celebration

text: We’re staying here from 30 December - 3 January 2018. Seem like brand new hotel, I love the bed so comfortable, the room is very clean and tidy every single day. text:
With an inexpensive price but still wanting to have a good service and clean room, Grand Ambarukkmo Hotel is the right choice.

The staff is very helpful and friendly, especially the restaurant staffs. The Indonesian food is so delicious, the pecel (Indonesia peanut sauce salad) and rempeyek (peanut crisp) are so good, I always want to get more for it. 

The room is not too big, but very comfortable for having a quality rest for light traveler like us. 

The location is close to one of the biggest mall in Jogjakarta, Ambarukmo Plaza, but it seems the zebra cross is highly needed in front of the hotel considering the number of vehicles passing the main street is quite high.

For those who want to have light travelling, staying at Grand Ambarukkmo Hotel is the great choice. You will get what you want!!
title: I get what I want!!

text:
I happened to stay at this hotel on July 2017. As I was informed by their staff. This hotel has not been celebrates its grand opening. As it is obviously seen from their staff uniform. Most of them are still using grey polo shirt and 'opening team' is printed on the back.

Overall, this hotel is satisfying. 
It is located in the opposite street of Ambarrukkmo plaza. 
Room and bathroom is wide enough and comfortable for the size.
Breakfast menu is good and they provide enough selections. 

However, during the stay, I may have to put some understandings due to their state. Some works are still on progress. And they may have to go thoroughly for their cleaning and house keeping. Thin layers of dust appear on some section of the room (i.e. cupboard area).
And, thank you for Pak Markus who gave me a name card and talked to me. Some experiences and comments regarding room facilities has been told and heard. 

I hope to be able to return in this hotel in near future in more comfortable and cleaner state. 

Have a good day for the opening ceremony which is being said that the ceremony will be held on the 22 July 2017.

text:
I spend my weekend here at Grand Ambarrukmo Hotel. The hotel location is at the opposite of one of the biggest and busiest shopping centres in Jogja -Plaza Ambarrukmo which only take 2 minutes walk from this hotel! 

LOBBY : First impression of the hotel was the lobby is definitely very spacious and the decoration was rather posh. the check in was with ease as I was checked in within 5 minutes. 

ROOM: The room was also spacious! it's definitely bigger than most rooms in Jogja and for this price, it can't go wrong and you can't find it anywhere else. The water pressure in the shower was strong and they also have a 'rain shower' facility by Grohe. The bed was EXTREMELY comfortable. Mind you that I'm a light sleeper and this bed managed to get me a straight 8 hours of sleep and that's amazing! The switch was also very modern as it's a sensor touch and it's very responsive!

POOL & GYM: Pool is located on the 5th floor but during this trip, I didnt try it but the pool was long and quite wide for a 4 star hotel.  

All in all, it was a great stay in this brand new hotel and I'll definitely stay at this hotel again in the future.
title: Fantastic New Hotel.

text:
People think a hotel stay is about nice rooms, good food, good location, friendly staff etc .. yes this is true but it is mostly about Kindness towards the Guests . Hotel Grand Ambarrukmo has many kind people • It offers Friendly Staff, Clean Rooms and great breakfast etc, Very kind and helpful Reception & Front Office Staff. Beautiful View from my 7th-floor room. Fantastic Breakfast all kinds of variety from Western to Indonesian, and local Yogyakarta food. Covid secure environment. 

I am particularly grateful to the Night Manager Mr. Rahmat who kindly picked me up from the station at 3.55 AM, advised me about local travels, etc & looked after me thereafter with a nice coffee and pastries. Mr. Rahmat was a kind man indeed. As I checked out after 2 nights Mr. Rifqi from reception was also kind and sent me off with a box of Breakfast Pasteries for my onward train journey. We cannot ask for any more kindness. I am a happy guest and a happy customer. Everyone from the Concierge to the Front Desk Staff was kind and always smiling and obliging. I loved my stay here and would return again.
title: Great Hotel Lovely Staff Value for Money

text:
I have stayed over a week at Grand Ambarrukmo hotel in YOGYAKARTA, and I am pleased to share my great experience here:

Rooms: 

- Excellent. They look very clean, bright & nicely appointed. Bathrooms are excellent with good quality bath products/ towels/ down pillows and duvets. The bed was large & very comfortable. You have different views. I was lucky to have the sunrise right from my window.

Food: 

- Breakfast buffet is lovely with many choices and well staffed. Fruits are fresh and many choices of nuts/ hot foods and omelet/pancake station. There are lots of traditional Javanese menus which are delicious. The western dishes & the fresh pressed fruit/ veggies juices were also  apetizing. 

- As my stay was during the ramadan, I could enjoy extra service from the hotel:  the breakfast buffet is ready from 3am (until 10am) to make sure those who are fasting can eat before the sun rises. Also, the IFTAR BUFFET starting from 5:30pm is amazing. Lots of freshness, varieties, colours in the plates, from entries to desserts. Great ambiance with entertainment. Very good moments !

Facilities: 

- Pool area is beautiful and easily accessible. There is also a jacuzzi which can be used on request . If you are lucky and the weather is good enough, you can have your morning swim with a nice view on Merapi volcano .

- The gym is near the pool area . You have treadmills, bikes , benches, mats, dumbbells up to 20kg, Swiss balls. It's more than enough to keep yourself in great shape during your stay .

Service: 

-From the check-in , concierge and the hotel staff were very polite & helpful. They are listening to the clients & trying their best to help out. Great service !

I was very pleased of my stay in Grand Ambarrukmo and I am looking forward for my next stay there during my future visits to jogja. 

Suksesss & sehat selalu kepada Grand Ambarrukmo, its management & it's staffs. Sampai ketemu lagi 😊🙏
title: EXCELLENT STAY AT GRAND AMBARRUKMO YOGYAKARTA

text:
I have had the pleasure of multiple stays (excess of 16 nights) in the last 4 months (March-June 2021) whilst visiting Yogyakarta on business.  The rooms are modern, clean and quiet - an absolute blessing when you need to rest your travel weary head.  

The bed(s) & pillows are fantastically comfortable, something that cannot be said for the many other hotels I frequent in the course of business, when I can only 'hope' to get a good night's sleep.  At the GrandA - a restful sleep is well assured, each time, every time.  

But what makes the hotel so attractive is the warmth and helpfulness of the staff, from those gentlemen at the entrance, the helpful front desk staff, dining room staff (cooks too) to those staff members servicing my room - ALL polite, friendly, ever smiling and extremely helpful.

Oh, and if you need to do some shopping or eating, the Mall is right across the busy road, but thankfully linked by an overhead covered walkway with elevator access for those who may be frail or disabled - so convenient. 

Do yourself a favour and try this hotel and I am certain you will be coming back time and time again, like I do!
title: The Grand is Great!

text: After months in Bali in our house during  the Corona Pandemic we decided to travel to Yogya and Solo for a few days. Having stayed at the Grand Ambarrukmo Hotel before we immediately felt like coming home even though a number of the team members of the past were not working there anymore.  We got a double room on the 5th floor at the far end which is slightly bigger than the normal rooms however this comes with a higher price. As the room on the fifth floor is on the same level as the swimming pool and the gym spending the extra money is worthwhile. A new addition to the hotel is a covered very well designed passage bridge across the very busy main  road to the adjacent shopping center with its many shops and a great variety of different restaurants. The bedroom like all other areas were spotlessly clean throughout the 6 nights we stayed at the hotel. However we were a bit disappointed by the breakfast which in the past was always a highlight during our stays in this hotel. Due to the Corona Pandemic It is understood that the previous big choice of self service options was replaced by a limited selection provided in individual service stations by cooks. The choice on offer was throughout our stay always the same, for example the bread station offered always the same options as by the way most other stations as well. Thus after 3 days we were a bit disappointed by the lack of choices. We greatly enjoyed the two dinners we took at the hotel, they were cooked to perfection. In all areas the service was excellent and all employees were friendly and smiling.  Hopefully our next visit will be during 'normal' times without restrictions. But whatever the situation we will certainly return.
title: A safe bet for a great stay also in difficult times

I stayed in Jogja because I accompanied my husband who visited his project there. Since I spend many times alone, I decided to strolled in Ambarrukmo Plaza. the connecting bridge helped me out much. I don't need to worry in crossing the busy road between the mall and the hotel.

And the last factor which made me happy was the hotel concerned about covid19 protocols. They gave me a package consisted of a hand sanitizer, a gloves, and a mask. At the restaurant, they put food in separate plates so that the visitor don't need to touch the buffet.

text:
Stayed here during Borobudur Marathon 2019, and the shuttle bus meeting point is located at Plaza Ambarrukmo which is just right across the street. There is a connecting bridge from hotel to shopping mall, 1st floor.
It's very near to the airport (Adi Sucipto), only 20 minutes away. Awesome!

The check-in process was quick, and the reception staff is so friendly and helpful, advising me to pack my breakfast either before leaving hotel at 2 a.m. for Borobudur marathon or after my return to the hotel at 11 a.m. Request for late check-out is allowed (latest at 1 p.m.).
When I return to hotel (around 11:45 a.m.), the breakfast wasn't ready yet at the lobby, so the two (2) packs of them were delivered to my room. The Fried rice was delicious, complete with egg, fried chicken, pickles and kerupuk. Another pack is Toasted Egg Sandwich with chili/tomatoe sauces. All breakfasts are including two (2) bottles of mineral waters.

I had excellent, perfect stay at Grand Ambarrukmo Hotel for its cleanliness, spacious room and comfortable bed. Unfortunately, I didn't have time to try hotel facilities such as swimming pool and fitness centre.
Overall, I enjoyed my stay at Grand Ambarrukmo Hotel and would recommend this hotel to family and friends for short or long stay in Yogyakarta. Perfect!
title: Perfect in Location, Comfort and Hospitality

text:
Stayed here for 4 nights. Hotel is rather new in the area. 
Room size: average size for hotel in Asia
Cleanliness: Lobby, restaurant, gym and hotel room are cleaned but housekeeping drop the ball one day during our stay. Supervisor and Manager were very apologetic and fixed the problem in a timely manner! 
Staff: Mgr. Windnada, Ms. Arni and Ms. Hema provided exceptional services! Thank you for making our stay near perfect!
Location: 3 min walk to the nearby mall that has not much to see. There are no local shopping around the area only a convenient store next door. 
Restaurants: Highly recommended both restaurants in Royal Ambarrukmo hotel and Grand Ambarrukmo hotel. 80 percent of the morning buffet dishes are local dishes with amazing selections.

text:
My husband and I stayed at this hotel due to wedding invitation. 
Choosing this hotel for the location and nearby shopping mall since we're not staying long. 
We travelled by train and checked in at the hotel at around 2am. 
Checked in process was fast and smooth, the reception (mas Wawan) was very nice and friendly.
The disappointment was when I woke up in the morning, I just realized that there were dried blood stain (I think) on the bed sheet. I immediately asked the house keeping to change the bed sheet and also informed to reception. 
We went out the hotel early in the morning due to the wedding, and with great hope I can take a rest with new bed sheet when coming back to the hotel. Yes, our room was already cleaned but when I checked the bed sheet, it was not changed 😭 have to wait more than 1 hour to get the housekeeping, and just wondering why the housekeeper said that the bed sheet already changed. 
I think the hotel management should make the SOP that for new guest, they HAVE TO change the bed sheet. It is not nice to make other guest use the bed sheet that already used by previous guest.
Aside the complaint, the breakfast was good and serve various food. 
Hope the hotel management take a note on this disappointment.
title: Not too happy

owner_response.text:
Dear Mrs. Tri H,

Warmest greeting from Grand Ambarrukmo, Yogyakarta.

We thank you for your feedback and please accept my sincere apology on behalf of our hotel. I am very sorry to learn that your experience with the housekeeper. They should have handled the situation well. 

In this regard, we failed. We should have trained our staff so that they understood that under certain circumstances, they should immediately change the bedsheet or connect a customer with a supervisor.

Promise that it won't happen again and why it's important that it doesn't.	
Please be assured that this type of situation will never happen again. We have put new procedures in place as of today, that will ensure that they should understand standard guidelines and procedures.

Mrs. Tri, we once again regret very much for the incident and thank you once again for the comments and hope to see you in the near future.

Warm Regards,

A. Retnowati
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
This hotel would be one of my favorites in Jogjakarta. 

Some reviews are below:
- Room space is sufficient, not really large but nice.
- Bathroom is very nice. The walk-in rain is very good.
- Breakfast varieties are great. My favorite is fresh juice corner and jamu (Javanese traditional drink). Since, I was stay for 2 days, I still considered they really did a good work to serve breakfast varieties. Almost all foods are delicious.
- Swimming pool are great and comfortable, small but very clean. 
- Gym is also okay. Small but quite sufficient for exercise. 
- Friendly staffs and good ambience at hotel
- Another plus is you can connect to the mall easily

text: After 5 years not visiting Yogyakarta, finally we had a chance to come back here, to Yogyakarta. Because we loved to stay at different hotel, so we checked several hotels before. And finally pick this hotel. It's because the price is affordable and we can have corporate rate. Corporate rate is that they have an agreement with the company that I worked for. I stayed with my husband and 2 teenagers. The room is big enough for 4 of us. And we choose the floor with the same floor as the swimming pool that is at the 5th floor. Actually, our first choice is at Royal Ambarrukmo, but unfortunately, we don't get the room that we choose. So, because Grand Ambarrukmo is also with the same management, and also across the Plasa Ambarrukmo, we decided to stay here. It's really comfy and the staff is so nice and the service is good. There is like a welcome drink that we can take when we get in to the hotel. I think it's somekind of jamu, but I'm not sure. But it's so relieve to drink it after we get back from outside especially, Jogja is so hot.
title: First time stay here

text:
Just stayed for 10 days at Grand Ambarrukmo in Jogjakarta. This hotel is located conveniently across from Ambarukkmo Mall, the main shopping plaza in Jogja. Rooms are clean and well equipped. Breakfast is delicious and caters for both Indonesian and Western people. 
Like many good hotels, Grand Ambarrukmo has quality staff in every department. These people make you feel extremely welcome. Cannot speak highly enough of their hospitality and warmth. Thank you so much to Eny, Sylvia, Adit, Dony and Alvin (also known as) Blackie. 
These guys are in the Lounge area on the 5th floor which has Live Bands ( quality) on Saturday nights and Karaoke if you fancy yourself as an entertainer on Fridays. 
All in all a great place to base yourself for everything Jogja has to offer. 
I frequently visit Jogja and have stayed at many hotels. This one is well priced and has my full recommendation.
title: Very Good Hotel. Great Staff

text: I booked 4 rooms for 4 night (family holiday), asking 2 weeks earlier to get a connecting room/adjoining room because there will be a children's and elderly, when we arrive, we get 4 different rooms that not connected and separated crossed the hallway, and when my family gets busy going in and out to another room to find some of their stuff or talking with other family members, the hotel send their 3 staff and warn us because they think we are being too noisy...what are you expecting when you separate a family like that? - Buffet breakfast food - taste is so-so and you might need to wait before able to enter the restaurant because they are full capacity (no ETA, so wait until some seat available) - in room 609, the bathroom is smelly, calling their front-desk and their staff comes and try to fix, but the stinky aroma back in few hours...tired with all the drama with this hotel, I decided to just accept the situation WILL NEVER COME BACK TO THIS HOTEL ANYMORE!
title: Do not go to this hotel if you travelling with family!

My husband and I visited the hotel for 4 nights in mid December and had a wonderful stay. The hotel staff really couldn’t do enough for you, particularly Sylvia who gave us a delicious cake one afternoon!

The hotel rooms were of a good size and clean, whilst all other amenities (pool, gym, breakfast etc) were also very good.

Our only learning was that the hotel isn’t really in the centre so the only thing you can walk to is the shopping mall opposite and a few restaurants, but no real tourist spots, but that wasn’t an issue for us as it would have taken an extra 20 mins to get in and out of the centre to see the main attractions.

If we are in Yogyakarta again we will definitely stay here!
title: Wonderful hotel stay

text:
I stayed in this hotel for 8 nights with my family. We stayed in the Deluxe King room. The room was on level 5, which was great for us as it was the same level as the gym and the pool. It was not noisy at all. The room was kept clean daily. One of my grouse was that the towels were not replaced after being taken away for the first 2-3 days, and we had to call Housekeeping to remind them. After that, it was ok. 
The gym was good and functional. Room service was great too. Food selection was wide and quality was good. The breakfast buffet range was sufficiently wide. The staff were all warm and courteous. One of the perks of staying here for us was its close proximity to the Plaza Ambarrukmo mall and the hotel has an on-demand shuttle to and fro. This suits our schedule perfectly. 
I will definitely recommend this hotel again.
title: Best Hotel I stayed in Yogyakarta

text:
When we arrived at the hotel from the airport later then expected, we were immediately welcomed by the nice bellboys and security who helped my dad getting out of the car (he can’t walk without help), also with the luggage. Check-in was quick and efficient, the guy at reception was super friendly and helpful. Then we were shown to our adjoining rooms for our two night stay and I was glad to see that the rooms were exactly like the pictures. The rooms were big, comfortable and luxurious. All the amenities were available in the bedroom and bathroom.

The beds were heaven, we just arrived from Thailand and the beds are super hard. So this was like sleeping on a cloud, the pillows were absolutely Devine! I had the best sleep during my four week holiday, it’ll be hard to top.

The bathroom had a big shower and constant hot water, very important ;)

After a heavenly good night sleep, we went for breakfast and were immediately approached by Silvia. She asked us if we wanted coffee or tea brought to the table and afterwards asked us if she could help my dad and I get some food from the extensive breakfast buffet. That was something we never came across at any hotels we stayed in during our trip to Thailand and Indonesia. 

Like I mentioned before, my dad can’t walk without help, so my mom and I usually take care of his breakfast first before starting on our own. But Silvia came to the rescue, she was the loveliest girl, very polite and helpful. She was helping my dad pick out his breakfast and collecting it to take to the table. This never happened in any other hotel we’ve visited and was the first time I felt there was somebody taking over for the care of my dad. Even though it may seem just something small, but for me it meant everything. After we finished eating our breakfast, she came back over to ask if we needed anything else from the buffet and also to get to know us a little bit. 

After breakfast we went to the mall and the staff near the door and outside, again, were super helpful arranging a taxi for us, helping us to get the wheelchair in the car and my dad safely seated. 

I could go on and on about how the staff of the hotel were really the best, all of them, but I want to really thank #Silvia again. Because the next day at breakfast she was at our side the moment we stepped in the restaurant and providing us with her superb service. 

When we come back to Jogja, we’ll definitely stay here again!
title: 5 star service at a 4 star hotel!

text:
My partner and I visited Yogyakarta this month and stayed at the Grand Ambarrukmo hotel. The hotel was extremely clean and very comfortable (the beds are huge) but what really stood out was the service.  All the staff were extremely nice and polite. 

The quality of the food at the restaurant was very good and breakfast had an amazing amount of options that catered to all tastes (local and western style alike). But best of all was how the staff went out of their way to assist us with my partner's dietary requirements (who is coeliac). They even baked gluten-free muffins on purpose for our breakfast (which were amazingly tasty). We also loved the cassava with cocunut and palm sugar (dish whose name I have now unfortunately forgotten). Many thanks to Silvia, Andhi and to all team for all the effort and care.

Thanks also to Ditra, our tour driver who took us to the Borobudur and Prabanam temples, for helping us with our tickets, awaking at an impossibly early time make sure we got there for the full experience and showing us a bit of the local music and culture.

Overall, our stay in Grand Ambarrukmo was extremely pleasing and we would definitely reccomend it any traveller that comes to Yogyakarta and wants to have a lovely time.
title: An amazing time

text: After staying for one night we returned to the hotel a few days later for another two nights. Our first impressions during the first stay were reconfirmed during the second stay: this is a great hotel for business people, holiday makers and weekenders to feel comfortable and well cared for. It has not the grandeur and splendor of the Royal Ambarrukmo but through its design, the color scheme of brown and various shades of grey throughout, the hotel creates harmony and well being. The rooms are very comfortable and have a good size. Everything is available that you expect from a new four star hotel. The breakfast buffet is excellent in choice, presentation and quality of food, the restaurant pleasant and the service even though mostly by young waiters and waitresses fast, friendly and attentive. The food experienced in the room during our stay was very good. The swimming pool is sufficiently big to give enough space to do your laps. The garage is well designed giving enough space for the cars to be parked easily. But above all, all the team members we met - even though many still very young and not so experienced - are showing true hospitality, big smiles, attentive service and the will to please the guest. When observing the team members how they interact with the guests as well as among each other one feels the harmony they create. When coming back to Yogya there will only be one hotel to consider, namely this one.
title: Harmony wherever you are

text:
The hotel is not centrally located however is not far from the airport and a short taxi drive from the city center; it's close to many small restaurants and just in front of a mall with all facilities you might need including a big supermarket, coffees, ATMs and Currencies Change Office.
The room we stayed was big and even with an additional bed for our son it was enough roomy; beds were comfy, bathroom with a big shower was well maintained and clean.
Breakfast was very well displayed in the big restaurant, the quality of the food was very good with a fair variety (it's more Asian oriented than Western anyhow it caters to all tastes/needs).
The swimming pool are is nice and big; also the fitness center is got for some work out and running on treadmills.
The Staff at the front desk, at the restaurant and at the swimming pool are was very kind and smiling.
I would definitely recommend this hotel.
title: Good hotel in Yogya

text:
Stayed for two nights to attend business trip to Jogja.
Checking out of the hotel with hard feeling as I still want to enjoy the hotel with its service and facility much more

Lobby is just nice, compact but gives the feeling of comfortable. 
Only the centerpiece at the middle of lobby might be reviewed but I am sure they change it periodically. When I stayed there it was “wedding theme” and not too match with the overall hotel concept. Not a big deal as it is only my opinion, others might be like it much.

Front desk agent was friendly and explained all what guest needs.
Room was great. They now what is the meaning of comfort and apply it there. Not too big but spacious and easy for the mobilization in the room.
Two thumbs up for the room décor, all perfectly picked and done. Pillow was so awesome, didn’t want to wake up from it 

F&B (Banquet and Restaurant) was superb in service and food taste.
But during breakfast, the waiter/ss should be more attentive in offering coffee/tea right away to the guest and serve it soon.
Two times I had breakfast, both did not manage to sip a coffee; first day no one ever passing by and over the coffee or just for me to request until I had to go, second day the request came too late when I have to leave.

But overall, this hotel is truly recommendable for whatever your purpose while visiting Jogja.

Keep up the GREAT work
title: New Great Hotel in Town

text:
Room is spacious. The single beds are big, clean, comfy and sleep was effortless. However, the lights are dim and I could only get a city view. Sewer smell was quite bad in the bathroom.

Laundry service was very expensive and late. Had to call them to get my clothes delivered. Got more than 500 IDR bills for just laundering T-shirts. Regret taking the laundry and should have bought new ones instead. Breakfast was of nothing special.

It's a walk distance from Ambarrukmo Plaza. But I just can't justify the price, you'd better off staying in other hotels when you visit Yogyakarta.
title: Overpriced Laundry

text: I went to restaurant inside Grand Ambarukmo hotel and had lunch and took their Business Lunch menu which they had brochure everywhere. When we arrives we have been told that the menu of Sayur Lodeh is not available, while actually there are another 2 menus option which they didn't offer. I took menu of Soto Lamongan set. What a bad service from them, it took almost 50 minutes to get all my food. The first 15 minutes they only offer Kerupuk and water without asking if I want to have another drink, 30 minutes I ask again and they said wait a moment, 45 minutes I ask again and they said almost done and I almost want to walk out and the entree Soto Lamongan came up. The taste was horrible that's not Soto Lamongan taste that's more to Soto Betawi taste. When the main course came out my lunch appetite already gone. It was really horrible, they are not ready and they didn't apologize at all. Guest next to our table also experience the same thing, too long to wait our food. A 4 star rated hotel they should have proper business luncheon preparation, in fact they present horrible lunch.
title: Business Lunch, Horrible Lunch

text:
This is a new hotel to their old sibling 'Hotel Ambarrukmo'. Located in front of the Ambarrukmo Plaza, 10 minutes away from the airport (around 4km).
The hotel is a brand new one, even the ballroom and the fitness centre are not ready yet. The room is big and spacious and everything is working properly. Breakfast is great, lots of choice from local dishes to international. Lots of restaurant in the mall. There are several others reataurant that outside the mall alongside the road.
Transportation to and from hotel quite easy as the hotel reside in the main road. 
I am having a great time staying here.
title: Good Location

owner_response.text:

Kindly be informed that our Fitness Center is now ready. Our treadmills have built-in TV monitor and internet connection facility which enables guest to stay connected with outside world. Interior works of our ballroom and lounge on the 5th floor are being carried out, in  which these two facilities are expected to be ready before end of this year.

text:
New hotel close to the city. They offered modern amenities through out the hotel. Room was modern and nicely design. Comfy bed and warm tone of the room. Bathroom spacious. Clean and well furnished. Internet was fast. No complaint on the room. 

Service was impeccable. Check in and check out was a breeze. During breakfast food was delicious,coffee was good as well. 

They have decent size of pool and gym at the 5th level. We didnt get to try but we wanted to try the gym as it offers decent space and equipment. 

They may need to give more variation in room service. But we were going to ambarukmo mall all the time to get food so that was not a problem. 

Overall we love our stay in Grand Ambarukmo! thank you!
title: Great Service and Modern Hotel

text: Schon der Empfang im Front Office ist bemerkenswert ruhig schnell und effizient. Pak Winanda und sein Team sind überaus freundlich und hilfsbereit. Auch spezielle Wünsche, wie Auto mieten, Sehenswürdigkeiten ansehen, Karten besorgen für Ramayana Ballet. Wirklich sehr aufmerksam. Auch der Fahrer Herr Anton weiß sehr viel über seine Stadt. Findet überall hin und macht sogar Überstunden um seinen Gästen die Wünsche zu erfüllen. Die Zimmerpreise ist Ok. Das Badezimmer im Top Zustand. Keine Abnützungen bemerkbar. Essen im Restaurant sehr sehr gut und Kreativ. ( Gado Gado ). Frühstück reichhaltig, immer topp der Chefkoch kümmert sich persönlich darum. Das Swimmingpool nicht zu gross aber zum Schwimmen gut geeignet. Manchesmal fallen die Zimmertüren sehr laut ins Schloss. Aber das ist auch schon das einzige das etwas stört. Danke für sovielühe
title: Ein der besten geführten Häuser.

text:
Positiv: zentral gelegen, sehr guter Service, gute Sauberkeit, gute Ausstattung, Angenehme Betten und Sanitäranlagen, große Frühstücksauswahl, freundliche Menschen, großer Pool

Neutral: das Essen schmeckt ok. Leider ist vieles, was eigentlich warm sein sollte, kühl oder kalt - wird dann aber auf Nachfrage sofort aufgewärmt.

Negativ: man hört auf dem Flur jede Tür ins Schloss fallen und jedes normale Gespräch, da die Türen vermutlich nicht so gut gedämmt sind.
Zudem kommt hinzu, dass nebenan Hühner gehalten werden und man ab 2:30 Uhr alle halbe Stunde geweckt wird, weil der Hahn bzw. Die Hähne sich unterhalten....
Dadurch dass der Flughafen  so nah ist und das Hotel an der Hauptverkehrsstraße liegt, hört man durch die Scheiben auch diese beiden nervigen Geräusche sehr laut. Wer nur einen leichten Schlaf hat, sollte sich Ohrenstöpsel mitnehmen!

Alles in allem: empfehlenswert !
title: Sehr gut, aber laut

text:
Neben dem tollen Hotel Royal Ambarrukmo hat sich im letzten Jahr der große Bruder an der anderen Strassenseite einen Namen gemacht. Grand Ambarrukmo ist ein Geheimtyp. Mit professioneller Vornehmheit verbreitet diese Hotel einen besonderen Charm. Besonders durch das Team der Beschäftigten.
Besonders hervorzuheben der Generalmanager Pak Didin Muhidin.Er kümmert sich persönlich um das Wohl seiner Gäste. Ist stets anwesend und man kann mit Ihm jederzeit ein nettes Gespräch beginnen. Ganz besonders herzlich der Frontmanager Pak Winanda. Jeder Wunsch wird erfüllt und die Herzlichkeit welche er und sein Team
verbreiten wird man in Yogyakarta selten finden. Er organisiert einfach alles. Für uns hat er eine Wayang Kulit Veranstaltung organisiert hat sich selbst vorher überzeugt ob auch gespielt wird und der Fahrer blieb bis 3 Uhr Früh. Danke nochmals.
Wenn Sie ein Auto mieten dann im Hotel die Fahrer sind toll ausgebildet und fahren Sie überall hin. Wir hatten Glück und der beste der Fahrer Herr Ditra konnte uns an mehreren Tagen fahren.  Sein Hobby ist Raily fahren und das kommt ihm im täglichen Verkehr dieser gigantischen Stadt zu nutze. Wie schnell und sicher er sich durch den Stau bewegt ist sensationell. Er weis über alles bescheid und findet die kleinsten Strassen. Wenn sie  Durian essen wollen fragen sie Ihm er weiss nicht nur die besten sondern handelt auch noch den Preis aus.
Wenn Sie eine fast  familiäre Athmosphäre mit großer professionalität suchen
das Grand Ambarrukmo ist für uns das beste Hotel in Jogjakarta. Ein kleines Pool und ein kleines Fitnesszenter rundet das Angebot mit der sehr guten Indon. und Intern. Küche ab.Vielen Dank an alle für Ihre Bemühungen dass  Sie uns den Aufenthalt soo angenehm machten.
title: Geheimtyp für Yogyakarta

Hotel nuevo, moderno y de muy buen nivel. Solo nos alojamos una noche en hotel, de camino entre Yogy y Bali.
Las habitaciones están muy bien equipadas, limpias y cómodas. 
En frente tiene un centro comercial, que está bastante bien. Nosotros cambiamos dinero ahí en la planta baja, y en la última planta tiene un food court bastante bueno.
También te preparan un picnic por la mañana si sales pronto, y no puedes tomar el desayuno en el hotel.
La atención en la recepción también fue excelente.
Hotel muy recomendable.

text:
Alles ist ausgesprochen sauber, das gigantische Frühstücksbüffet hat eine riesige Auswahl (indonesisch und international) und dennoch sehr sehr hohe Qualität, lecker! Als wir aufgrund einer Tour mitten in der Nacht los mussten, wurde uns ein sehr edles Frühstückspaket gerichtet. Das Personal ist durchweg wahnsinnig freundlich, jeder einzelne Mitarbeiter ist motiviert und zuvorkommend, Service und Entgegenkommen wird hier ganz groß geschrieben. Als wir an einem anderen Tag früh los mussten, baten wir darum, ein paar Minuten vor Öffnung des Frühstücks um 6 Uhr reinzudürfen. Wir durften 30 Minuten vorher rein, um noch in Ruhe frühstücken zu können- was für ein Service!!!
Der Pool ist sehr schön und gepflegt. Freitag und Samstag abends gibt es ein leckeres und umfangreiches BBQ am Pool Mit Live-Musik. Jeden Abend gibt es ein anderes Unterhaltungsprogramm für die Gäste, von Karaoke über Salsa-Tanz. Gegenüber ist ein großes Einkaufszentrum mit Kino und allem, was man braucht. Es gibt viele Wäscherein im Umkreis, auch einen Service im Haus. Da wir pro Kilo waschen wollten, wählten wir die Laundry Zone, das ist hinter dem Hotel in der nächsten Querstraße, ca. 300 m entfernt, dort war es super und günstig. Zusammenfassend fühlten wir uns super wohl und verlängerten unseren Aufenthalt nach 4 Nächten noch einmal. Man fühlt sich im Grand Ambarrukmo Yogyakarta immer äußerst willkommen! Wir empfehlen das Hotel mit vollster Überzeugung weiter!
title: Exzellentes Hotel

text: Van vriendelijk personeel, tot luxe kamers en heerlijk eten. Geen minpunten voor dit hotel! Het personeel is erg vriendelijk, bij binnenkomst meteen geholpen met de tours die we wilden boeken en hebben hier mooie ervaringen door opgedaan. De kamers zijn erg luxe, lekkere bedden en een hele goede douche, wat nog wel eens ontbreekt. Ook het eten is heerlijk. Door onze vroege tochten miste we het ontbijt, er werd een lekkere clubsandwich voor ons gemaakt, wat we onderweg konden opeten. Na terugkomst in het hotel kan je gewoon lunchen, eigenlijk is het restaurant bijna 24 uur open en hebben ze hele variërende gerechten van goede kwaliteit.
title: Geen minpunten

text:
2017년 12월 관광을 위해 이틀간 투숙하게 된 이 호텔에서 아주 인상적이고 친절한 호텔 직원을 만나게 되었다.
시설도 깨끗하고, 직원들도 매우 친절했으며, 호텔 근처에 Mall이 있어 모든것이 좋은 조건의 호텔이었다.
족자를 여행할 분들에게 적극 추천하고 싶은 호텔이다. 가족단위 여행, 홀로 여행, 허니문 여행 모두에 적합한 호텔이라고 생각된다
인도네시아에서 약 20년 생활하면서 이곳 사람들을 많이 접하고 살았지만 이곳에서 만남 호텔 직원(Tince)은 매우 친절했기에 여행을 마치고 돌아온지 2개월이 넘었지만 그 직원에 대한 감사의 표현이 필요하다고 생각하여 후기를 적어본다.
평소 성격 상 후기를 남기거나 하는 행위를 하지 않는 사람이다.
투숙을 마치고 Checkout 하기 전에 다음 목적지인 자카르타로 가기위해 항공권 예약을 여행사에 확인해 보니 뭐가 잘못되었는지 예약이 되어 있질 않아 곤란한 지경에 처하게 되어 호텔 프론터에 가서 도움을 요청하며 무려 두시간을 직원의 도움을 받았는데 인상 한번 찌푸리지 않고 친절히 도움을 주어 무사히 목적지로 갈수 있었다.
다시 족자를 가게되면 작은 성의 표시라도 할 생각이다.
Terima kasih banyak Tince
title: 호텔직원의 친절에 대한 감사의 글

text: 4 notti passate qui a cavallo del Capodanno 2017. Ottima posizione, servizio eccellente e personale numeroso e professionale. Camere praticamente nuove, ottimo king bed e aircon efficiente. Piscina e palestra al quinto piano valide. Colazione a buffet molto ampia, tipicamente javanese ma con molte possibilita’ di salato, dolce, frutta, seduti sia dentro che fuori. Sicuramente hotel di livello internazionale. Eccellente la cena offertaci per il Capodanno, un buffet dal quale non si riusciva a staccarsi. Il tutto per circa 70€/notte. Bravi.
title: Molto valido

text: 日惹蘇丹投資的五星飯店, 旁邊是百貨購物中心, 距機場及市區都不遠, 搭公車都可到達, 非常方便, 飯店有些歷史了但房間重新裝潢過, 大又舒適, 還有個大陽台可以優閒的看看風景, 早餐是我吃過五星飯店服務最好的, 品項多, 而且幾乎都是現場製作的, 還有民俗樂團現場演奏, 氣氛營造的非常好.有到日惹特區一定要來體驗五星級的氛圍 !
title: 日惹最優質的五星飯店

owner_response.text:
Dear Yen Ping L,
Thank you for taking the time to record your comments on Tripadvisor for your review of the stay.

We very much appreciate your compliments regarding the hotel location being next to the shopping mall, the balcony overlooking the scenery. Having read your comments about the hotel especially the star rating I notice that your comments were meant for our sister property - Royal Ambarrukmo a 5 star legendary property which is located next to Ambarrukmo Plaza shopping mall and opposite Grand Ambarrukmo.

I shall pass your comments on to our sister property Royal Ambarrukmo

Once again, thank you for compliments and look forward to welcoming you again to either Royal Ambarrukmo or Grand Ambarrukmo

Best regards

Diaz Yonadie
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik
